===Changed===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|General
|
|
* New mob spawning algorithm.
* Mobs are lighter in color when injured.
* Passive mobs now spawn in groups.
* Increase the health of all mobs to the values in Java Edition.
* The game now spawns fewer mobs, clearing out old hostile mobs.
* Animals no longer disappear.
|-
|[[Zombie]]
|[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|
* Zombie AI and mechanics have been changed to make them more team-like.
* When attacked, there is a small probability of spawning more zombies.
|-
|[[Spider]]
|[[File:Spider JE3 BE2.png|128px]]
|
* Now generates on [[leaves]], making tree biomes have more spiders at night.
* Animation is now twice as fast.
* Improved AI.
* Line of sight no longer passes through solid blocks.
|-
|[[Creeper]]
|[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|128px]]
|
* Go faster now.
* Improved AI.
* No longer floats 2 pixels above the ground.
* Now has correct explosion range.
|-
|[[Camera]]
|[[File:Camera old.png|128px]]
|Completely removed camera entity.
|}
